column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Hi Kennie - Thank you very much for the stars. We greatly appreciate it
column2: and we are especially happy to know we rank high in your estimation as a ramen connoisseur. We've only been open for just under two years
column3: but we hope we have been able to put Houston on the Ramen Map of the United States. Thanks again
column4: and we hope to serve you again soon.
